meanings.definition: One who takes part in a scrimmage.
meanings.sent1: The young scrimmager ran eagerly onto the field.
meanings.sent2: During the football game, the scrimmagers showed great teamwork.
meanings.sent3: The little scrimmager tripped over his own shoelaces, causing laughter all around.
meanings.sent4: In the world of ants, the queen is the ultimate scrimmager, leading her colony to victory.
meanings.sent5: The determined scrimmager pushed through the defense to score the winning goal.

meanings.definition: A practice game or informal match.
meanings.sent1: Let's have a friendly scrimmager before the real match.
meanings.sent2: The kids played a quick scrimmager in the park.
meanings.sent3: The family picnic turned into a fun scrimmager of tag.
meanings.sent4: The chess club members enjoyed a challenging scrimmager to test their skills.
meanings.sent5: The office workers organized a lunchtime scrimmager of basketball for some exercise.

meanings.sent1: The teams will scrimmager before the big game.
meanings.sent2: We need to scrimmager to practice our plays.
meanings.sent3: The siblings decided to scrimmager over who gets the last cookie.
meanings.sent4: The students will scrimmager against the teachers in a friendly match.
meanings.sent5: The animals in the forest will scrimmager for food during the winter months.
